November 19, 2023

TRY: Installing Wappalyzer

Wappalyzer browser extension is available in major browser brands. If you are curious what technologies run a website, the extension will show a breakdown of the site page's technology in use.

Wappalyzer analyzes simple and complex web applications.

RWB shows it is currently hosted on Netlify.
[02-14-2023]

The extension provides links that offer further insights and extend API usage capabilities.

The app extension sends and receives messages using JavaScript.

Features of the app

  • HSTS security implementation
  • Extensions and imports:
    • JavaScript frameworks
    • JavaScript libraries
    • PaaS
    • Analytics
Top
